title: CETUS: Causal Event-Driven Temporal Modeling With Unified Variable-Rate Scheduling
summary: This paper introduces CETUS, a method for causal event-driven temporal modeling with unified variable-rate scheduling. It focuses on event cameras that capture asynchronous pixel-level brightness changes with microsecond temporal resolution. The work addresses challenges in processing event streams, particularly in real-time efficiency for pointwise detection methods.
